price: 22.Nabii Muusa madyan dcqsitta baaxô fanah gexoh yufkune waqdi:yi-Rabbi massa-le gitay madyan yoo gudduysa yoh ascassele iyye.
arabic: وَلَمَّا تَوَجَّهَ تِلۡقَآءَ مَدۡيَنَ قَالَ عَسَىٰ رَبِّيٓ أَن يَهۡدِيَنِي سَوَآءَ ٱلسَّبِيلِ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: walammā tawajjaha til'qāa madyana qāla ʿasā rabbī an yahdiyanī sawāa al-sabīli
